org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs.secondary.local

Class LocalFileSystemIgfsFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs.secondary.local.LocalFileSystemIgfsFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IgfsFile

    public class LocalFileSystemIgfsFile
extends Object
implements IgfsFile
    Implementation of the IgfsFile interface for the local filesystem.

        Parameters:
        path - IGFS path.
        isFile - Path is a file.
        isDir - Path is a directory.
        blockSize - Block size in bytes.
        accessTime - Access time in millis.
        modTime - Modification time in millis.
        len - File length in bytes.
        props - Properties.

      • accessTime

        public long accessTime()
        Gets file last access time. File last access time is not updated automatically due to performance considerations and can be updated on demand with IgniteFileSystem.setTimes(IgfsPath, long, long) method.

        By default last access time equals file creation time.

        Specified by:
        accessTime in interface IgfsFile
        Returns:
        Last access time.

      • modificationTime

        public long modificationTime()
        Gets file last modification time. File modification time is updated automatically on each file write and append.
        Specified by:
        modificationTime in interface IgfsFile
        Returns:
        Last modification time.
